attributes.action: HM Government should support the electorates' decision to leave the EU.
attributes.background: The majority of British electorate voted to leave the European Union, and HM Government as representatives of the electorate should uphold the  democratic vote.

rejection.details:
If you want the Government to take specific action, you could start a new petition calling for this. Alternatively, if you want the Government to invoke Art. 50 immediately, you could sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133618
